metadata.title: CVE-2018-6381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In ZZIPlib 0.13.67, 0.13.66, 0.13.65, 0.13.64, 0.13.63, 0.13.62, 0.13.61,0.13.60, 0.13.59, 0.13.58, 0.13.57 and 0.13.56 there is a segmentationfault caused by invalid memory access in the zzip_disk_fread function(zzip/mmapped.c) because the size variable is not validated against theamount of file->stored data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2').
